name: Tomato and Herb Vinaigrette
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, herbs, tomato
recipeIngredient: 1 medium-size ripe tomato, skin and core removed, cut into 1/4-inch cubes, about 1/2 cup
1/4 cup finely chopped green onions or scallions
1/4 cup coarsely chopped fresh basil or Italian parsley
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place all the ingredients in a mixing bowl and blend well with a wire whisk.
